entry.title: Future Blog Post
entry.content: This post will show up by default. To disable scheduling of future posts, edit config.yml and set future: false.

entry.title: Brief Introduction to ML for Trading

link.title: Brief Introduction to ML for Trading

entry.content: This summer I took a fascinating course — Machine Learning for Trading. For those who don’t know me, I’m pursuing my Master’s in Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning. Every semester, I like to reflect on what I’ve learned and share it in an abstract yet informative way. If you have even a little familiarity with Machine Learning and math concepts, you’ll find this article easy to follow.
entry.summary: This summer I took a fascinating course — Machine Learning for Trading. For those who don’t know me, I’m pursuing my Master’s in Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning. Every semester, I like to reflect on what I’ve learned and share it in an abstract yet informative way. If you have even a little familiarity with Machine Learning and math concepts, you’ll find this article easy to follow.
